section.p: Once you've specified an FO processor, you may need to perform further configuration for that processor. An instance of FOP lives within the DITA Open Toolkit's pdfs plugin (in the folder spdf3/fop). For other processors (Antenna House and RenderX), the location of the configuration files depends on where you installed the processor.

li.p: FOP - The file spdf/fop/conf/fop.xconf indicates the configuration, including the path to the fonts. This can be the most difficult part of FOP configuration, because we have noticed that Adobe renames fonts when its products are installed.

Antenna House - The files are in C:\Program Files\AntennaHouse\AHFormatterVxx (the version number might be different). The most common file to modify for Antenna House is font-config.xml. Documentation for Antenna House (in HTML format) is in the docs folder. See docs/ahf-font.html for font configuration information, or just start with docs/index.html.

RenderX XEP - To my knowledge, we haven't done a lot modifying RenderX XEP, nor have we worked with a stand-alone version of the product. When installed with XMetaL Enterprise, RenderX XEP is installed in: C:\Program Files\Common Files\XMetaL Shared\renderx.
